attributes.action: Attempt to change the national anthem to the Dambusters March or.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are looking to change the National Anthem to something that inspires confidence and brings out the true nature of us Brits, allowing us to be pround and uplifted by such an occasion.

We need an anthem that shows our patriotic side, not songs like yellow from coldplay or Oasis but orchestral, the likes of the Dambusters March or Jerusalem seem very fitting and will definitely get people on their feet feeling proud to be British.....the whole point of a National Anthem, to show we've arrived!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
